mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.assignment_id, a.title AS assignment_title, s.student_id, u.real_name AS student_name, s.content, s.attachment_path, s.score, s.comment, s.status, s.create_time, s.update_time FROM submission s LEFT JOIN assignment a ON s.assignment_id = a.id LEFT JOIN "USER" u ON s.student_id = u.id WHERE s.student_id = #{studentId}
